application.name: Gilt
application.author: Justin Carter
application.description: Gilt turns a Balsamiq Mockups design into UI code that you can work with. This version works with form fields only. Simply choose "File - Export Mockup..." in Balsamiq Mockups, paste the BBML from your clipboard into CF Builder and select/highlight it, then right click on the selected text and choose "Gilt - Convert to HTML". Other customisable output formats are coming soon.
